notes: Very modern, renovated apartment with recessed lighting, clean white tile flooring, and a well-equipped kitchen with built-in appliances including oven and range hood. The space appears very clean and spacious with good natural light from large windows. For baby safety, the unit is on a single level with no stairs visible, though exposed floor outlets should be covered; no balcony or dangerous railings visible in the images. Video intercom system suggests a secure building.
